channel.title: web3 ecosystem on
channel.description: Recent content in web3 ecosystem on

item.title: ERC721 standard
item.description: ERC721 tokens are not interchangeable and not divisable. Each once is assumed to be unique (they have a unique ID). You can only trade them as a whole units.

item.title: tokens
item.description: A token on [[Ethereum]] is basically just a [[web3/Smart contracts|smart contract]] that implements a standard set of functions that all other token contracts share, such as:
